revised_title: Reevaluating the Radiocarbon Technique for Measuring Phytoplankton Photosynthesis
tldr: The authors analyze a theoretical model of photosynthesis and respiration in phytoplankton, concluding that the radiocarbon technique for measuring primary productivity overestimates net photosynthesis, especially in short-term ecological incubations. They suggest reevaluating the assumptions of the technique and testing its validity in different conditions.
